pullRequest.title: For #109 test for SliceFromConfig
pullRequest.bodyText: For #109 added test for SliceFromConfig and updated artipie-http version.

nodes.bodyText:
@olenagerasimova we can extract this to a private method to avoid code repetition:
SliceFromConfig.build(this.config(${type})).toCompletableFuture().get()
@olenagerasimova let's simplify throws part with just throws Exception, it's a little bit verbose
